name: Tianji
overview:
Tianji is far and away China’s largest professional SNS, with more than six million registered users. In June of 2011 Bloomberg wrote that Tianji was poised to “Cement Lead Over LinkedIn in China.”

The company was founded by Derek Ling in 2005. Mr. Ling previously served as a VP at Sina.com, in addition to working for Apple and Motorola.

Tianji is owned by Viadeo Group. Based in Paris, Viadeo Group is the largest global professional SNS company for non-English markets, with more than 35 million users.

milestones.description: Launch company profile pages in April 2012. It is an important tool for companies to build their brands to reach Chinese professionals.
milestones.source_description: 天际网推公共主页 打造社会化营销平台

milestones.description: Tianji's parent company Viadeo raised $32M and a third of the funding will be invested in China
milestones.source_description: Now at 45m members, LinkedIn rival Viadeo lands $32m to spur growth in Europe, emerging countries

milestones.description: Tianji was acquired by Viadeo, a leading professional social network in Europe. This acquisition marks Viadeo's global strategy.
milestones.source_description: Viadeo Gives Global Executives Access to China's Largest Professional Social Network Via Tianji.com
